claim: only 1 of the vehicle speed record be in the 21st century
resp:
Here are the steps to reason through the claim:

1. Identify the time period to check for records set in the 21st century. The 21st century started on January 1, 2001.

2. Scan through the table to find the dates of each speed record.

3. Compare each date to the starting date of the 21st century (2001-01-01) to see if any date is later than this year.

4. If there is at least one date that is later than 2001, then the claim is FALSE. Otherwise, if all dates are before 2001, the claim is TRUE.

Now let's check the table:
- The first record was set on October 3, 1967 (row index = 0). This is not in the 21st century.
- The second record was set on July 28, 1976 (row index = 1). This is not in the 21st century.
- The third record was set on January 1, 1960 (row index = 2). This is not in the 21st century.
- The fourth record was set on August 21, 1989 (row index = 3). This is not in the 21st century.
- The fifth record was set on August 11, 1986 (row index = 4). This is not in the 21st century.
- The sixth record was set on December 22, 2006 (row index = 5). This is in the 21st century.
- The seventh record was set on May 1, 1984 (row index = 6). This is not in the 21st century.

Since only one of the records (the sixth) was set in the 21st century, the claim is TRUE.
